data.description:
Vivid Vision Home is designed by doctors and vision scientists to provide affordable binocular vision treatment. Using the latest therapeutic techniques, vision therapy in VR may help improve eyesight in patients with lazy eye and other conditions. Vivid Vision Home uses challenging video games with anti-suppression, virtual prism, and other binocular vision treatment techniques to help improve acuity (clarity of vision) and depth perception (3D vision). 

Vivid Vision is only available from an eye care provider, such as an optometrist or ophthalmologist, and is designed to complement in-clinic therapy. Your eye care provider will customize your settings and how often to re-evaluate your condition in a clinic. 

Ready? 

For Vivid Vision Home, you will need the activation code provided by your eye care provider and a virtual reality headset.

Find out how to get your prescription from a Vivid Vision provider by visiting our website:

https://www.seevividly.com/doctor_locator

changelog.change_log: Language selection is now available! More languages will be added in the future. Some bugs were addressed, notably in Pepper Picker (flag) and Barnyard Bounce (stars, baby chick).

Barnyard Bounce - The energy bar is now correctly seen in only one eye while collecting golden eggs.
Step Vergence & Jump Duction - The correct amount of virtual prism is now applied while in BU or BD mode and left eye is dominant.
Ring Runner - The post-activity results display no longer disappears a few moments after the game ends.
Turbo - The recenter function no longer results in offset placement.
General - Users should not experience crashes after removing the headset for several minutes and putting it back on.
Vivid Vision Home is now available on Quest for the first time! See vividly in six degrees of freedom!
Vivid Vision Home for Oculus Quest brings you the Vivid experience in six degrees of freedom, no wires attached!
